user.title: Connect to Sigenergy Energy Storage System
user.description:
Set up a Sigenergy Energy Storage System to monitor and control it through Home Assistant. 

Make sure the Sigenergy system is connected to the same network as Home Assistant and the Modbus option has been enabled by the installer.

data.host: Host ( IP address of the main Sigenergy inverter )
data.inverter_slave_ids: Inverter Device IDs ( comma-separated when multiple. Default is 1 )
data.ac_charger_slave_ids: AC Charger Device IDs ( comma-separated when multiple. Default is empty for no AC charger )
data.dc_charger_slave_ids: Inverter IDs with DC Chargers attached ( comma-separated when multiple )
